name: Space
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: all those of the creature who summoned it

traits.name: The Law of Motion
traits.desc: No enemies within 60 feet can gain the benefit of magical movement.

traits.name: Chaos Vulnerability
traits.desc: The Inexorables have disadvantage on all saving throws against spells.

traits.name: Inexorable
traits.desc: The Inexorables are immune to any effects that would slow them or deny them actions or movement.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
